projects.title: Rise & Shine
projects.subtitle: An alarm clock app that won't stop until you smile in to the camera.

collection.description: Designing this app was a ton of fun. It's concept is unque and beneficial to those who have a hard time waking up happy.
Easily select which days the alarm will repeat. This screen allows you to easily access app settings as well as your not-so-glamorous morning photos.
Set your phone to strobe, vibrate, play audio, or all of the above! Sounds were provided by Nico Audy-Rowland, musician for Red Vs Blue.
We save each smiling mug you used to stop the alarm. A simple pull-down action reveals these embarrassing photos. You can view and edit or opt out of saving each photo.

projects.title: Scrybe
projects.subtitle: A simple app for translating text to various languages

collection.description: A simple concept called for a simple interface. This was my first attempt at flat design inspired by iOS7's newly introduced design principles.
Clicking on the top right menu reveals saved translations ready to be played or edited.
